Articles.Content:
I kollaborate, and now there are two hills.

Me and [@0111narwhalz](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/110660-0111narwhalz/)s hills.

A caretaker brooms both hills into one heap and drops a cigarette roach.

Fire hill.
I have CO2, and I put out the fire. My charred hill.

Com=del\_over "C://KSPF/Games/kingofthehill"

Con=proceed (y/n)

Com=y

No more thread due to the 'unfortunately accident' called being overwritten.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-12-21T19:09:13Z" title="12/21/2017 07:09  PM" data-short="6 yr">December 21, 2017</time> by KerBlitz Kerman**

> Access denied. Not enough user privileges. Please, inform the administrator.

Well-protected hill.

It rains on your unprotected servers, short circuiting them, rendering all commands or passwords useless. I set a house, and invite ALL USERS OF THE KSP FORUM to set up their homes and shops in the hill 4 free (with a 700 m^2 limit (it’s a very large hill)). 

We are forum. We are union. We are Kerbal Space Program City. 

Our hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-12-21T19:35:03Z" title="12/21/2017 07:35  PM" data-short="6 yr">December 21, 2017</time> by Nailed it!**
  
MOAR limit space

Mods ban you for the unauthorized moderation.

Mods' hill.

The mods  then take the hill and distributes the hill equally among all the forum users.

Everyone's hill! Now there should be no more conflict...
I get greedy, and set up a nuke to explode while I am away from the hill. My radioactive hill.

I take the hill, protected from the radiation, as no one dares to enter.

My still radioactive hill.
I come back from "away", and lock you in. My radioactive hill with a person inside.

I ask for food and friendship and then we become friends.

Our hill.

The friends have eaten their food and start eating yours.

Resource Redistribution Hill.
Krakens then take and hide supplies, insuring their survival while condemning ours.

I'm sick of the collaboration, so I unleash all my wolves on the collaborators and, since wolves are even better collaborators than you people they eat you. I gas the wolves so they become unconscious. I also pay for Spacetraindriver's train, so he woln't bug, me.

My Gassy, unconscious wolf hill.

> 
>

> 
> 
> I'm sick of the collaboration, so I unleash all my wolves on the collaborators and, since wolves are even better collaborators than you people they eat you. I gas the wolves so they become unconscious. I also pay for Spacetraindriver's train, so he woln't bug, me.
>

> My Gassy, unconscious wolf hill.

I walk in and trap the wolves in a wolfproof box using a HAZMAT suit. My hill with me in a HAZMAT suit.

i light it on fire.

my gas-exploded hill

I Order StarKiller base too blow to up. I reinforce the Thermal Ociliator aka ray shield it and ray shield the ray shield generator then shield both generators. 

My planet

I win

Surprise! Plot armor and weapons save the day once again!

Your pile of very hot rocks in space.

Who me?

Who else? The plot weapons blow up Starkiller because plot.

Still your pile of space rocks.

What do you mean Plot weapons 

this is individual of the film

what is going on...

Um...

Y'know what? Starkiller's staff revolts and overthrow the First Order. Starkiller Base is up for grabs.

I Order Death Star II With a localized Sheild Generator Under a Localized Ray Sheild to destroy StarKiller base after jumping out of Hyperspace.

I also Order Death Star II become self sufficient for up too 1,000 years.

Surprise! A No-body pilot from a backwater world launches another lucky proton torpedo and blows up ANOTHER Death Star!

Your pile of debris.
